competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Market leader in payroll and HR services

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll provider for small and mid-sized businesses

competitors.name: Paylocity
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in mid-market cloud HCM

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: Merged with Kronos in 2020 to form UKG

context: In 2020, Paycom competed in the mid-market HCM space against larger players ADP and Paychex and similar-sized Paylocity. The major industry event was the merger of Ultimate Software and Kronos to form UKG in April 2020, creating a major competitor. The pandemic shifted focus to remote workforce management and digital HR processes, benefiting cloud-native HCM providers. Paycom's single-database architecture and employee self-service were key differentiators.
